name: ensureSuccessType
signature: <A>() => <A2 extends A, E, R>(effect: Effect<A2, E, R>) => Effect<A2, E, R>
description:
A no-op type constraint that enforces the success channel of an Effect conforms to
the specified success type `A`.
documentation:
A no-op type constraint that enforces the success channel of an Effect conforms to
the specified success type `A`.
